name: Baller (theawesomedev)
description:
baller is a multiplayer player game where you live in the clouds as a ball as you try not to get topped by the evil squares! 

Put any glitches or suggestions in the comments! It is preferred to use a controller, but I have no idea if a ps4 controller works with this so test it out for me, please!  

This game was inspired by a game  called rebound 2: https://tic80.com/play?cart=626

all art and music was made by me

CONTROLS:

controller (dpad and joystick):

  • A to jump lower
  • B to jump higher 
  • any trigger to dash
  • down to go through a platform

first player keyboard:

  • left and right arrow keys to move
  • period to jump higher
  • comma to jump lower
  • M to dash
  • down arrow to go through a platform

second player keyboard:

  • A and D to move
  • F to move lower
  • G to jump higher
  • H to dash
  • S to go through a platform
